skills.name: Smithing
skills.description: The art of creating and improving weapons and armor from raw materials.
skills.scaling: Allows crafting of better weapons and armor

skills.name: Destruction
skills.description: The School of Destruction involves harnessing of fire, frost, shock and other forces that undo creation.

skills.name: Enchanting
skills.description: Enchanting is the arcane art of infusing matter permanently with magic energy.
skills.scaling: Allows creation of more powerful enchantments

skills.name: Restoration
skills.description: The School of Restoration involves both healing and protecting spells, as well as those that undo the undead.

skills.name: Illusion
skills.description: The School of Illusion involves manipulating the mind of the enemy, as well as the dark arts not known to many.
skills.scaling: Reduces spell cost for illusion spells

skills.name: Conjuration
skills.description: The School of Conjuration governs both Necromancy and summoning entities from the realms of Oblivion.
skills.scaling: Reduces spell cost for conjuration spells

skills.name: Alteration
skills.description: The School of Alteration involves the manipulation of the physical world and its natural properties.
skills.scaling: Reduces spell cost for alteration spells

skills.name: Speech
skills.description: Those who dabble in the fine art of speechcraft are able to haggle for the best prices, and to convince about anyone of anything.
skills.scaling: Improves prices when buying and selling

skills.name: Alchemy
skills.description: Alchemy is the art of creating magical potions, extracts and deadly poisons.
skills.scaling: Increases potion strength and allows discovery of more effects

skills.name: Sneak
skills.description: Sneaking is the art of moving unseen and unheard.
skills.scaling: Reduces detection chance and increases sneak attack damage
keyAbilities: Perform sneak attacks for bonus damage

skills.name: Wayfarer
skills.description: Seasoned Wayfarers, whether travelling alone or grouped, are proficient at opening locked doors and containers, as well as exploring and fining more treasures.
skills.scaling: Makes lockpicking easier and reduces lockpick breakage
keyAbilities: Pick locks on doors and containers

skills.name: Finesse
skills.description: The art of pickpocketing, taking risks and elevating your own self.

skills.name: Evasion
skills.description: Evasion is the art to evade enemy blows and allows a character to defend efficiently if he wears only light or even no armor.
skills.scaling: Reduces damage taken when wearing light armor

skills.name: Heavy Armor
skills.description: Heavy armor reflects a warrior's talent in wearing heavy armor and fighting in it.
skills.scaling: Reduces damage taken when wearing heavy armor
keyAbilities: Wear heavy armor for maximum protection

skills.name: Block
skills.description: Blocking reflects a warrior's skill in parrying and deflecting blows and his aptitude with a shield.
skills.scaling: Reduces damage taken when blocking and increases bash damage

skills.name: Marksman
skills.description: Archery governs the use of bows and crossbows. The greater the skill, the more deadly the shot.
skills.scaling: Increases damage with bows and crossbows

skills.name: Two-handed
skills.description: The art of combat using two-handed weapons, such as greatswords, battle axes, and warhammers.

skills.name: One-handed
skills.description: The skill to use light weaponry, among which are daggers, swords, axes and maces.
keyAbilities: Use swords, daggers, axes, and maces
